name: miru
description: web development server for bundlers and/or static files, parses terminal and DOM errors ( inline sourcemaps supported )

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run pass
scripts.build: npm run build:source && npm run uglify
scripts.build:source: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: browserify --node --no-bundle-external --standalone miru -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] src/server/miru.js -o dist/miru.js
scripts.build:client: browserify --bare -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] src/client/main.js -o dist/miru-connect.js 2>&1 | wooster
scripts.watch:client: watchify -v -t [ babelify --presets [ env ] ] src/client/main.js -o dist/miru-connect.js 2>&1 | wooster
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify:client && npm run uglify:server
scripts.dev:css: node src/server/miru.js -v -p test/stage/ --development -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ]
scripts.dev:js: node src/server/miru.js -v -p test/stage/ --development -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ]
scripts.dev: node src/server/miru.js -v -p test/stage/ --development -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ]
scripts.dev:dist: ./cli.js -v -p test/stage/ --development -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ]
scripts.cli: ./cli.js -p test/stage/ --development -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ] -t test/stage/index.html
scripts.cliWithLogs: ./cli.js --logs -p test/stage/ --development -w [ npm run watch:stage:js, test/stage/bundle.js ] -w [ npm run watch:stage:css, test/stage/bundle.css ] -t test/stage/index.html
